He turned around and noticed a strange rock. "What's this thing?" Luffy bends down to pick it up, but all of a sudden, the rock flashes like a strobe light, and blinds Luffy. Then, the light ends. info.brief_description: One of the boys from One Piece shrinks
info.description: This is mainly about Luffy, Zoro, Usopp, or Sanji shrinking on the Going Merry. They cannot die, more than one guy can shrink, but no girls (Nami or Robin). No gay stuff, only giantess. Also, please use atleast readable grammer. Other than that, GO CRAZY!
